import React from "react"; import { Formik, Form, Field, ErrorMessage, FormikHelpers } from "formik"; import * as Yup from "yup"; import Button from "../Button"; import { IProfessional } from "../../alias/IProfessional"; import { ITypeOfProfessional } from "../../alias/ITypeOfProfessional"; const schema = Yup.object().shape({ name: Yup.string().min(4).max(150).required(), email: Yup.string().email().min(4).max(150).required(), telephone: Yup.string().min(10).max(25).required(), typeOfProfessional: Yup.required(), situation: Yup.boolean(), }); interface IProps { onSubmit(value: IProfessional, action: FormikHelpers): void; loading: boolean; initialValues?: IProfessional; typeOfProfessionals: ITypeOfProfessional[]; } const defaultValues: IProfessional = { name: "", email: "", telephone: "", typeOfProfessional: {} as ITypeOfProfessional, situation: false, }; const FormProfessional: React.FC = ({ onSubmit, loading, initialValues = defaultValues, typeOfProfessionals, }) => { return ( ) => { onSubmit(values, action); }} >
{typeOfProfessionals.map((top) => ( ))}
); }; export default FormProfessional;
